# Ton Frinking

| birth_place         = Groningen, Netherlands
| death_date          =
| death_place         = Delft, Netherlands
| party               =
}}
Antonius Bernardus Matthijs Frinking (1 February 1931 â€“ 3 August 2022) was a Dutch politician. He served in the Royal Netherlands Army as a major from 1969 to 1975 and as lieutenant colonel from 1975 to 1977. He served as a member of the House of Representatives from 1977 to 1993. Frinking died in August 2022 in Delft, at the age of 91.
